items.title: Instagram might soon let you remove yourself from someone’s Close Friends list
items.description: Since the feature's launch in 2018, users haven't been able to remove themselves from someone else's Close Friends list.

items.title: Blue Origin pauses space tourism flights to focus on the moon
items.description: The company is trying to take advantage of President Donald Trump's desire to return astronauts to the lunar surface by the end of his term.
